description.narrative: The operations to be financed will enable these companies to rehabilitate and modernise the district heating infrastructure in their cities, decrease operating costs, reduce CO2 emissions and make the district heating system more energy efficient. The operations will be carried out under the Integrated Approach to Reform in the Ukrainian District Heating Sector that will be focused on establishing systemic policy dialogue with the relevant stakeholders in the Ukrainian government focused on urgent reforms with respect to regulatory and institutional framework in the utility sector.
